sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM USERS WHERE LOWER(USERNAME)=LOWER(#userName#)
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM USERS WHERE LOWER(USERNAME)=LOWER(#userName#) AND PASSWORD=dbms_crypto.hash(to_clob(#password#), 2)

SELECT USERNAME as userName, IS_ACTIVE_DIR as isActiveDirectory, STATUS_USER as statusUser, LOGIN_SESSION as loginSession, EMPLOYEE_ID as employeeId, SYSTEM_LEVEL as systemLevel, ACTION_DATE as actionDate FROM USERS WHERE LOWER(USERNAME)=LOWER(#name#)
